Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime

Interface MIMELocator

public interface MIMELocator
A locator enables the recipient of parsing events to be informed of where within the MIME entity a parsing event has occurred. The parser will notify a MIMEHandler with an instance of this interface before parsing begins. The instance's state will change during the parsing process so it is not suitable for permanent association with any resulting artifacts.
Author:
Chris Burdess

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    getColumnNumber()
    Returns the current column number.
    long

    long
    getOffset()
    Returns the current byte offset within the overall entity.

  • Method Details

    • getOffset

      long getOffset()
      Returns the current byte offset within the overall entity.
      Returns:
      the position of the parser relative to the start of the MIME entity byte data

    • getLineNumber

      long getLineNumber()
      Returns the current line number. 1-indexed.
      Returns:
      the logical line number within the MIME entity, i.e. the number of CRLF tokens seen by the parser

    • getColumnNumber

      long getColumnNumber()
      Returns the current column number. Zero indexed.
      Returns:
      the logical column number within the MIME entity, i.e. the byte offset since the last CRLF was seen by the parser
